message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial asking price. Would you consider $925,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $920,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
